mapper.update: UPDATE enterprise SET enterpriseBusinessNumber = #{enterpriseBusinessNumber}, enterpriseName = #{enterpriseName}, enterpriseOperator = #{enterpriseOperator}, enterpriseEmployees = #{enterpriseEmployees}, enterpriseUrl = #{enterpriseUrl}, enterpriseWoringHours = #{enterpriseWoringHours}, enterpriseTask = #{enterpriseTask}, enterpriseNumber = #{enterpriseNumber}, enterpriseSales = #{enterpriseSales}, enterpriseProfit = #{enterpriseProfit}, enterpriseSalary = #{enterpriseSalary}, enterpriseAvgSalary = #{enterpriseAvgSalary}, enterpriseWelfare = #{enterpriseWelfare}, enterpriseVision1 = #{enterpriseVision1}, enterpriseVision2 = #{enterpriseVision2}, enterpriseVision3 = #{enterpriseVision3}, enterpriseDiscription = #{enterpriseDiscription}, enterpriseRegion = #{enterpriseRegion}, enterpriseMessage = #{enterpriseMessage} WHERE enterpriseSeq = #{enterpriseSeq} ;
